OrgName: Serengeti Law, a division of West Publishing Corporation
activities: Serengeti Tracker is a web-based legal matter management and electronic billing system that connects corporate legal departments with their law firms around the world.  Personal information is entered into our system by end users regarding themselves and potentially the legal cases they are working on.
